RawLead.title: RawLead
RawLead.description: Represents a raw lead found by the Scout agent from an external news API.

id.description: Unique identifier for the raw lead.

imageUrl.description: URL of the image associated with the story.

title.description: The original title of the source article.

content.description: The description or content snippet from the source.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the lead was created.

DraftArticle.title: DraftArticle
DraftArticle.description: Represents a draft article written by the Journalist agent based on a RawLead.

id.description: Unique identifier for the draft article.

rawLeadId.description: Reference to the RawLead that this article is based on.

headline.description: Newspaper-style headline written by the AI.

content.description: The content of the drafted article (250-word objective report).

imageUrl.description: URL of the image for the article.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the article was drafted.

NewspaperEdition.title: NewspaperEdition
NewspaperEdition.description: Represents a published edition of the newspaper.

id.description: Unique identifier for the newspaper edition.

editionNumber.description: The edition number of the newspaper.

headline.description: The main headline of the cover story.

htmlContent.description: The HTML content of the newspaper edition.

publicationDate.description: Date when the edition was published.

coverImageUrl.description: URL of the cover image for the edition.

definition.description: Collection of raw leads found by the Scout agent.
Collection of draft articles written by the Journalist agent.
Collection of published editions of the newspaper.
